summary: A data structure that encapsulates all outputs produced by a causal (autoregressive) language model with mixture‑of‑experts, including prediction scores, optional loss values, auxiliary MoE loss, router probabilities, cached attention key/value tensors, per‑layer hidden states and attention maps.
business_intent: Enable downstream applications and training pipelines to retrieve model predictions, compute losses, manage cached states for fast decoding, and analyze MoE routing behavior in a unified, type‑safe format.
